text: Python: Create a tuple from a command line input
I have a program which provides a command line input like this:
Now, we can have any number of input parameters i.e.
-p a1 and -p a1 c1 b1 e2 are both possibilities.
I want to create a tuple based on the variable input parameters.
Any suggestions on how to do this would be very helpful!
A fixed length tuple would be easy, but I am not sure how to implement a variable length one.
